item.title: Windows 10 on old Macs without Boot Camp
item.description: Installing Windows 10 on older Macs is still possible but may be tricky because Apple doesn’t officially support this. Boot Camp Assistant has an internal list of Windows 7-only Macs in its Info.plist. With some hackery and foolery you therefore are able to trick it into installing Windows 10 on an otherwise unsupported Mac. Partially. I prefer to take the manual route and taking full control over this process. There are a number of hurdles to overcome.
